purpose: The email announces a two-year postdoctoral position in Empirical Software Engineering at Aarhus University, specifically focusing on the adoption of human-centered AI in software engineering. The position is part of the AI4SE1DK project, which aims to explore the effective and ethical use of Large Language Models in software teams. The email outlines the qualifications required for applicants, including a PhD in Computer Science or a related field, and emphasizes the collaborative nature of the research with industry partners. It also provides details about the application process, including deadlines and required documents.
